user_input:
Modify the DHEM model. 

• Get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level.
• Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. Copy the H2\Gas file.
• Create a new datafile object in the Datafile class using the Gas Pipeline category, call it something relating to PCIPMI capacities Unlimited. Add the filename property with the name of the datafile just created.
• Add a scenario called unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities.
• For each object in the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, add a max flow property that references the datafile and scenario created in the previous step.
• Clone the model "DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995", add the new scenario, and rename the model to "DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline".
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Retrieve the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model...', select the appropriate datafile attribute from the list.

tasks.description: Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by copying the H2\Gas file and setting all non-zero values to 999.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model...', select the appropriate file for modification.

function_args.user_input: set all values that aren't 0 to 999

tasks.description: Create a new datafile object in the Datafile class under the Gas Pipeline category for PCIPMI capacities Unlimited.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '...call it something relating to PCIPMI capacities Unlimited', select the appropriate category and naming structure.

tasks.description: Add the 'filename' property to the newly created datafile object with the name of the datafile variation.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, associate the filename property with the new datafile object.
Based on the user's request, create the scenario object with the provided name.

tasks.description: For each object in the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, add a max flow property that references the datafile variation and the new scenario.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the objects in H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories and update their properties with the new references.

tasks.description: Clone the model 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995', add the new scenario, and rename the model to 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the model to be cloned and append the new scenario.
